title: IBMi/OS400 build of the curl tool is broken due to curlx move
body:
### I did this

As we are approaching release now and have RC3, I grabbed the latest code from the master branch and built it on OS400 (V7R4M0). The build failed:

```
CZM1003:  /home/AKIRILLO/curl/src/tool_setup.h, 48.10: CZM0296(30) #include file "timeval.h" not found.
CZM1003:  /home/AKIRILLO/curl/src/var.h, 28.10: CZM0296(30) #include file <curlx.h> not found.
CZM1003:  /home/AKIRILLO/curl/src/tool_cfgable.h, 83.10: CZM0007(30) "struct dynbuf" is undefined.
CZM1003:  /home/AKIRILLO/curl/src/tool_cfgable.h, 359.3: CZM0046(30) Syntax error.
CZM1003:  /home/AKIRILLO/curl/src/tool_cb_prg.h, 34.10: CZM0007(30) "struct curltime" is undefined.
CZM1003:  /home/AKIRILLO/curl/src/tool_operate.h, 42.10: CZM0007(30) "struct curltime" is undefined.
CZM1003:  /home/AKIRILLO/curl/src/tool_operate.h, 43.10: CZM0007(30) "struct curltime" is undefined.
CZM1003:  CG2SETOPTS__819.c, 536.12: CZM0007(30) "struct dynbuf" is undefined.
CZM1001:  CG2SETOPTS__819.c, 541.5: CZM0304(10) No function prototype given for "curlx_dyn_init".
CZM1001:  CG2SETOPTS__819.c, 544.18: CZM0304(10) No function prototype given for "curlx_dyn_addf".
CZM1001:  CG2SETOPTS__819.c, 546.18: CZM0304(10) No function prototype given for "curlx_dyn_addf".
CZM1001:  CG2SETOPTS__819.c, 556.41: CZM0304(10) No function prototype given for "curlx_dyn_ptr".
CZM1001:  CG2SETOPTS__819.c, 557.5: CZM0304(10) No function prototype given for "curlx_dyn_free".
CZM1001:  CG2SETOPTS__819.c, 873.21: CZM0304(10) No function prototype given for "curlx_dyn_ptr".
CZM1001:  CG2SETOPTS__819.c, 875.22: CZM0304(10) No function prototype given for "curlx_dyn_len".
```

It looks like the recent move of some files from `lib` to `lib/curlx` did upset the OS400 build as it can not find the headers.

### I expected the following

I expect a clean build.

### curl/libcurl version

8.14.0-DEV (master branch as of May 21st)

### operating system

OS400 V7R4M0
